reviewText: Poor. Only one chapter of 38 minutes with no way to pause, or speed up. For the cost it is a rip-off.
It was not like the book

This video is only 36 minutes long. Are you kidding me? I spent this kind of money for a half hour movie? No where did it say the running time before I bought it, now I know why.
They did refund my money very quickly so I give them thumbs up for that. I feel they should say how long this video is and drop the price in half......

This is a great documentary about the persecution of the Early Church that stood on the Word of God. It explains the faith that these martyrs retained until their death, and how we must do the same in these last, final evil days which signifies the Second Coming of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ. These were courageous people who stood for God's Righteousness in the Holy Spirit in the Name of Jesus Christ!
